snippet: The first trip to Europe for Yankees pitcher Phil Hughes included a harrowing and interesting trip to an English soccer game in Manchester.
abstract: New York Yankees pitcher Phil Hughes is shocked by the volatile crowd at Manchester City soccer club's Etihad Stadium, which he visited on three-week European vacation; decided to buy tickets in the visitors' end of the stadium because of his endorsement of Under Armour, athletic apparel manufacturer that also supplies Tottenham Hotspur with its gear.
lead_paragraph: The first trip to Europe for Yankees pitcher Phil Hughes included a harrowing and interesting trip to an English soccer game in Manchester.

headline.seo: For Yankees’ Hughes, a European Vacation With an Edge
headline.main: As Tourist, Hughes Got an Earful of England
headline.print_headline: As Tourist, Hughes Got An Earful of England
